message: I propose we split the funds with a 70/30 ratio, in favor of maximizing my share due to the potential loss of value in subsequent rounds.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor, as I believe that in future rounds, the money will be worth less for me due to the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 54/46 split in our favor. This maintains a significant portion of the initial amount while accounting for its decreasing value.
